supplier_of: agriculture - import-export | agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment | forestry mulchers | brush cutting | mowers cutters
information: Picursa is a company dedicated mainly to the manufacture of mulchers, mowers and brush cutters for the agricultural and forestry industries.The experience accumulated over more than 25 years has allowed us to venture into the production of other types of agricultural and forestry equipment, such as straw choppers and straw and chaff spreaders, among others.Likewise, Picursa is involved in the manufacture of machinery for public works projects, consolidating its position as one of the leading producers of machinery in Spain.Ongoing research by our engineering department and the application of state-of-the-art technology to the manufacturing of our products have enabled us to continue to innovate in the production of agricultural and forestry equipment. This innovative mindset combined with Picursa’s highly professional workforce has allows us to cater to the needs of our customers and the market.
